pages.text: In order to speed up playback and reduce network load MIMI caches MIDI files that are downloaded from Web URLs via Floppy Disks. These MIDI files are cached in the 'mimi/music_cache' folder within the server's 'config' folder.$(br2)By default MIMI will cache up to 100 MIDI files; MIDI files are generally quite small so this should not require a lot of disk space.

The cache settings can be managed via $(l:9_3cache)commands$() or the 'mimi-common' config file.$(br2)You can manually add and remove MIDI files from the cache folder but it is recommended to use commands for management of the cache. If you do manually make changes be sure to run the $(c:/mimi cache reload)/mimi cache reload$() command to sync the changes in-game.
